sentences: Parties agreed that adaptation should be an integral part of a new agreement.
They also agreed on the need to address adaptation in the context of sustainable development and build on existing institutions.

Parties also addressed, inter alia : the balance between mitigation and adaptation; means of implementation; support for national adaptation strategies and plans; National Adaptation Plans for non-LDCs; and a platform for information exchange.
Swaziland, for the AFRICAN GROUP, called for a global goal on adaptation.
CAN said that mitigation, adaptation, and loss and damage must exist as parts of a continuum.
